content: this pattern is for a fun rainbow snake you can also use this pattern to make a temperature snake just change the color every day this snake is about 85 long you can make your snake as long or short as you wish yarn worsted weight # 4 yarn language english free versions of these patterns are available on my website https //www goldenlucycrafts com/crochet-snake/ by purchasing this listing you will receive the pattern in a print-friendly styled and advertisement-free pdf file format
